premise_source_doc_sentence: Motorola 's home and broadcast network products included set-top boxes , digital video recorders , and network equipment used to enable video broadcasting , computer telephony , and high-definition television .

All DASH recorders primarily use the SDIF-2  (  Sony Digital Interface Format-2  )  as a digital interface , which is slightly different than the S/PDIF / AES-EBU that nearly all other digital audio recorders use , but is technically superior because SDIF-2 's word clock is not multiplexed into the bitstream .
The S-VHS videocassette mechanism utilized by ADAT-format multi-track digital audio recorders made by Alesis ,
The Hi8 videocassette mechanism utilized by DTRS-format multi-track digital audio recorders made by Tascam such as the DA-88 , and
